## About
free-bitcoin.lat provides accurate, locally-relevant Bitcoin and cryptocurrency information for 15 Latin American countries. All content is written in Spanish (es-419) or Portuguese (pt-BR) and updated regularly with official source citations.

## Methodology
- Regulatory status sourced from official government publications (central banks, securities regulators)
- Price data from Binance spot + CoinGecko, cached every 5 minutes
- Remittance fee data updated quarterly from public fee schedules
- All content includes "Última actualización" timestamps and official source links
